summary.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.

value.span: 如果值是只读的;如果能修改它。

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件应将其设置为`true`及其设置为`false`创建前对象。A control should have its set to `true` and its set to `false` prior to the creation of a object. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，支持控件模式的特定于控件的了它的值递增或递减值。In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value.
